data.title: Donimar – Les meilleurs artistes roumains !!
data.meta_description: Qu’est-ce que l’art? Est-il besoin ou le désir création de l’homme?Ou sa liberté de manifester dans la création?Peut-être un et l’autre?Mais sûrement, l’art est une joie à l’âme.
data.text:
Salomeea Andronic 1938 – 2023

Salomeea Andronic is a titan of naive Romanian art, endowed with an extraordinary creative power, throughout his career, has taken and preserved in his art the purity and spirit of the Romanian village.

Salomea Andronic was born on January 18, 1938 in the village of Bara in Neamt County – Romania. He is the graduate of the Popular Art School in the class of Mr. Ilie Boca. She has been rewarded with many awards, he has participated in numerous exhibitions in his country and around the world, enjoying a wide appreciation for her pure and story-filled art.

Salomia Andronic est décédée début avril 2023.

Roxana Adriana Donisanu

Roxana has been painted before having learned to read or write.In the beginning,she used acrylic colors and then,at age of 9-10,she has chosen oil on canvas.Her paintings are as large as 80×80 inches.Roxana is the first child in Romania who opens a personal exhibition,(event closely watched by mass-media)She was highly praised in the world of Plastic Art.Encouraged by celebrities of the cultural life,as well as by mass-media,Roxana Donisanu has a very rapid ascension in the art world.She has been invited to national television shows moderated by Mr.Adrian Paunescu or Mr.Ion Cristoiu.There have been many news report written on her in a very short time.

In 1996 was accepted in the « Henry Coanda National Foundation »for support of extremely talented Teenagers.Between 1994-1999,she opened 14 one-woman exhibitions in Art Galleries and Cultural institutions in the cities:Bucharest,Cluj Napoca,Buzau,Bacau,Tg-Mures,Iasi and in Spain(2002) She impresses her onlooker and critics with her unique style.Her paintings are not just a series of characters and symbols but represent a world filled with color and can be translated lyrically.

She takes part in national and international contests and ,as proof of her talent,has won many prizes:1994-« Special Prize Red croos »1995-« the 3rd Prize,Form and color in nature »1996″National 1 st Prize,Tulcea,1st place »1996″International Prize « Floris Juventutis « Belgium » 1997″1 st Prize Iulian Antonescu Museum »1997″National 1 st prize,Tulcea,2nd place »1997″International 1st prize »Open Doors »1998 »Chitibus »Honour Prize,Tg Mures »1998″International Special Prize »Open Doors »2nd place » Roxana is also an accomplished student and has received the 1st and 3rd prize at the National Olympiad of Biology in 1999,2000,2001,2002.He becomes undergraduate to the Universities of Medicine from Bucuresti si Cluj-Napoca and in 2005 at Universite of Medicine « Rene Descartes » in Paris .In at present Roxana is a medicine woman in France.

All over the world she praise for her work and the paintings carryng Roxana’s signature are more and more looked for,many of them being found in museums or personal collections from U.S.A., France,Spain .Don’t miss the opportunity to have in your collection signed by this young artist who proves to be of a great force and vitality.

« The mature universe of this infantile vision was following close to the great art of French modern tapestry starting from the flat stain of Gauguin’s powerful concertation and overcomes in imagination and impetuosity Chagall’s fascinating figuration » Vasile Craita Mindra,painter

« Roxana’s painting is spontaneous and special,remaking up the infantile universe and helps us to discover,beyond the visible world,the cultural world where children live »Ilie Boca,painter

« Interesting enough are these achievements,full of suavity and tensioned by gravity with the deeps of the Alpin lakes and the tender sonorities of spring. These things offer the onlooker invisiblenets of significances where we can find not only the things and the human beings that surround her but also the heart of a 15-year-old little girl »Marina Preutu

« Is she a great artist?Is she a wonder?Is a genius?I don’t know but I have a got the belief that she is a great hope and that admiring her I fell a great joy »Iulian Cretu,President of The National Foundation »Henry Coanda »

Adrian Doni

Adrian Doni was born on the 8th of April 1959 in Bacau, Romania. He began his artistic education under famed local masters Constantin Ciosu and Stefan Pristavu. Doni’s works fit into several modern art categories, during his artistic career he experienced different techniques from landscapes and portraits to cubism and abstract art. In 1990 he exhibited at Ateneu Gallery in Bacau, in 1995 at Arta Gallery (Bacau) and in 1998 at Casa de Cultura (Suceava). Adrian Doni’s paintings demonstrate a mastery of design, colour, composition and draftsmanship. He communicates optimism by means of vivid colours to those who view his works.
